sections.heading: Last day for performance of act a holiday; effect1-303
sections.text: Last day for performance of act a holiday; effectWhen anything of a secular nature, other than a work of necessity or charity, is provided or agreed to be done upon a day named or within a time named, and the day or the last day thereof falls on
